data.text: Bɨ Pelisi ogɨnap, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep ogɨnap, kɨli Jelusalem nɨb Jisas yɨl apɨl
7.2 Luk 11.38 nɨgɨlak, Jisas bɨne ogɨnap tap ñɨŋɨnɨg ñɨn kɨli ma ñɨg lɨlak ak nɨm, nupɨs nɨsed sɨkop asɨk tep gɨl, tap ñɨbelɨgɨpal tek ma gɨlak.
7.3 Mak 7.5, 7.8, Jon 2.6, Gal 1.14 Pelisi binɨb okok dɨl, Juda binɨb okok mɨdupsek, nap nɨsed sɨkop agelɨgɨpal tek nɨŋɨd, monmon ma gɨl, ñɨn ñɨg lɨ yok lɨl tap ñɨbal.

7.4 Mat 23.25 Kɨli maket amɨl nab sɨŋak mɨdɨl adɨkɨd amɨl, abe ñɨn ñɨg lɨ yok lɨl tap ñɨbal. Gos kɨli pal ogɨnap nupɨs nɨsed gos nɨgelɨpal pal abe nepal anɨb ak tek, tin, kɨnag, kap tap okok abe ñɨg lɨ yokɨl lɨpal.

Anɨb ak Jisas bɨne okok yokɨp ñɨŋɨlak anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, bɨ Pelisi okok sek, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok sek nop agɨlak, Bɨ nad okok taynen bapi based sɨkop agɨlak tek ma gɨpal agɨlak? Ñɨn kɨli ñɨg ma lɨl tap ñɨbebal agɨlak.
7.6-7 Ais 29.13, Mat 15.8-9 Agelak, Jisas agak, Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb Aysaya, ne nɨbi bɨ takaw yepɨs apɨm okok nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agɨl, buk Baybol ak kɨl tɨkɨl agak,
Kɨli yɨb yɨp dad aplanɨbal ak pen, bɨ takaw anep agñɨbal ak, agñɨl apal, Nɨm ak God takaw ne apal agup agɨl tɨkak agak. Anɨb ak, yɨb yɨp yepɨs dad aplanɨbal agup agɨl tɨkak agak.
Nɨbi God takaw ne ak kelɨgɨl, binɨb takaw apal ak dun agɨl, nap nased sɨkop agelɨgɨpal adek ak kɨdek gɨpɨm agak.
Jisas kɨlop tepayaŋ agɨl agak, Nɨbi takaw nɨbi ke anep nɨŋɨd apɨm anɨb ak, God takaw agup ak kelɨgɨpɨm agak.

7.10 Kis 20.12, 21.17, Wkp 20.9, Lo 5.16, Mat 15.4 Mosis takaw olap kɨl tɨkɨl agak, Nanɨm nap takaw agɨnɨmil tek nɨŋɨd, kɨlop dɨtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Pen ñɨpay ogɨnap nonɨm nap kɨlop takaw tɨmel agenɨgel, paklem kumnɨgel agak.
Nɨbi pen taynen takaw anɨb ak tek ma agñɨbɨm agak. Nɨbi anɨgɨl apɨm, Bɨ olap nonɨm nap tap kɨlop ñɨbɨkop tek ak, kɨlop pen agup, Tap anɨb ak God nop ñin agɨl aglɨpin agup,
bɨ anɨb ak ne nonɨm nap tap ma gɨñonɨmuŋ apɨm agak.
Gɨpɨm anɨb ak, God takaw ne ak kelɨgɨl, nap nased sɨkop gelɨgɨpal adek ak nep gem amub agak. Nɨbi tap anɨb ak kuŋay nep gɨpɨm agak.
Jisas anɨb agɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop agek yek jɨj sɨŋak apel agak, Takaw agɨnɨgebin ak nɨbi nɨŋɨd, nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak.
7.15-16 Apo 10.14-15 Tap ñɨbel nab ayaŋ amnɨgab ak gach ma yenɨgab agak. Nab ayaŋ nɨb seŋ ownɨgab anep nɨm, gach yenɨgab agak.
Jisas anɨb agɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop kelɨgɨl kal mɨgan amek, bɨne okok nop agɨlak, Takaw paladaŋ lɨl apan anɨb ak, jɨj ne ak tay agɨlak?
Agel agak, Kɨli ma nepal tek, nɨbi abe ma nepɨm akaŋ agak? Tap ñɨŋeb mɨdupsek okok, monmon ñɨbel kogmeg nab ayaŋ amek, God nɨgek gach ma yenɨgab agak.

Taynen? Tap ñɨbal anɨb okok, gos kɨli nab ayaŋ ma amnɨgab agak. Kogmeg nab ayaŋ yɨbɨl amek, chɨb sek kɨl yokɨnɨgabal agak. Jisas takaw agak anɨb ak, tap okok mɨdupsek ñɨŋeb nep, asɨkep ogɨnap ma mɨdeb.
Pen Jisas agak, Gos tɨmel nab kɨlop ayaŋ nɨb apek nɨm, tɨmel gel God nɨgek gach yenɨgab agak.
Binɨb okok nab kɨlop ayaŋ gos tɨmel owaknɨŋ, gɨ tɨmel gɨl, tap si dɨl, chɨp ñagɨl, bin si bɨ si gɨl,

tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, takaw yepɨs agɨl, gos kɨli ke nɨŋɨd, tap okok yɨp tek yobɨkop agɨl, mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd binɨb agjuwɨl, monmon gɨl, yɨb ke dad aplanɨl tɨmel gep gos nokom nɨŋɨd gɨpal agak.
Tap tɨmel gɨpal anɨb okok, ke okok nɨb ma owup, gos tɨmel ak nab kɨli ayaŋ nɨb apek gɨ tɨmel gɨpal nɨm, God nɨgek gach mɨdeb agak.
Jisas Galili plopens kelɨgɨl, am taun Taya wulep okok amnak. Amɨl, binɨb okok ayɨp mɨñɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, kal mɨgan olap am we gɨl yek ak pen, we gɨl yonɨmuŋ tek ma lak.
Bin olap pen, payne nop kɨcheki abaŋ lak ak nɨm, Jisas owup agel nɨŋɨd, kasek am yek sɨŋak apyap pakɨl,
takaw kɨles tɨmel agɨl agak, Pay yɨp kɨcheki abaŋ lup ak, ge seŋ amnaŋ agak. Bin anɨb ak ne Juda mel olap. Nop tɨkɨlak Siliya plopens, taun ne nɨm Ponisiya.
Pen anɨb agek, Jisas nop agak, Chɨn ned tap mɨdup ñapay kɨlop ñɨnɨgun agak. Tap mɨdup ñapay chɨn okok ñeb ak dɨl chen mukon, tɨmel gɨnɨgab agak.
Agek, bin ak pen agak, Bɨawl. Ak tep apan ak pen, ñapay okok tap ñɨbel, dayday okok nep abañ muk okok yapek, chen okok ñɨbal sek agak.
Agek, Jisas takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd agak, Nad anɨb apan ak, pay nad kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkɨl mɨdeb ak, gesɨpin seŋ amub nen amnɨmɨn agak.
Agek, adɨkɨd amɨl nɨgak, kɨcheki kelɨg seŋ amek, payne mɨj adek ak kɨmɨgel kɨn yek.
Jisas taun Taya anɨb ak kelɨgɨl, am taun Saydon amɨl, man Dekapolis nab okok amɨl, Galili cheb amnak.
7.32 Mat 9.32, Luk 11.14 Am jakaknɨŋ, binɨb okok bɨ tɨmud pɨl gɨl takaw agtep ma golɨgup olap dad apɨl, Jisas nop agɨlak, Bɨ anɨb awl nop dɨnɨge suŋ laŋ agɨlak.
7.33 Mak 5.23, 8.23, Luk 4.40, 13.13, Jon 9.6 Agelak, Jisas bɨ anɨb anop poŋɨd keke sɨŋak amɨl, ñɨn mɨdup pal ak tɨmud mɨgan nop omɨŋal ak yokɨl, ñɨn mɨdup kɨñuk gɨl yalɨb nop ak dɨnɨgɨlɨg,
7.34 Mak 6.41, Jon 11.33, 11.38, 11.41, 17.1 kɨlan gɨl God man ne alaŋ nɨŋɨd, mɨŋel gek añɨŋ pogɨl agak, Epata agak. Epata agak takaw jɨj anɨb ak Pag yɨkan agak.
7.35 Ais 35.5-6, Mat 11.5 Anɨb agaknɨŋ, bɨ anɨb ak tɨmud mɨgan ak pag yɨkɨl, yalɨb nop gek suŋ laknɨŋ, takaw teplep yɨpɨd gɨl agak.
7.36 Mak 1.43-45 Anɨgek, Jisas kɨlop takaw anɨb ak binɨb okok ma agñɨnɨmɨb agak ak pen, kɨli amɨl binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl agñɨlak.

7.37 Ais 35.5 Takaw anɨb ak agñel nɨŋɨd, gos pal awl lɨl agɨlak, Jisas tap okok mɨdupsek gup okok, tap teplep ak nep agɨlak. Binɨb tɨmud pɨl gup okok gek nɨgtep gɨpal, binɨb yalɨb mɨŋel gup okok gek, takaw agtep gɨpal agɨlak.
